sentence: The hotel seems to manage an elegance and high level of professionalism whilst maintaining a relaxed atmosphere
In particular Culen the Guest experience manager went above and beyond to make sure the room and all the arrangements for the evening went flawlessly
My stay was comfortable relaxing and provided a fine experience of Sydney Quayside
The spa fitness center is one of the best I have experienced
Room service was an amazing experience
The breakfast was the highlight of the experience
Thanks for creating a fantastic memory
Overall the experience is great with wonderful views and services from the Hotel
We have only had wonderful service from Four Seasons from the front desk staff to cleaning staff great experience
Views were simply spectacular and a delight to experience Harbour fireworks from the comfort of our room
I have had great experiences at Four Season hotels all over the world but this property fails to measure up to the others
Unfortunately access is a little limited by the extensive ongoing roadworks on George St which detracts a little from the experience
yes there is construction around but that does n’t interfere with your experience
a sort of motel experience rather than Four Seasons or Shangri La
Not quite the 5 star experience you had expect from a Four Seasons but ok nonetheless
The initial check in experience at the front desk was not great due to the reservation not having been entered correctly on the system We ’ve never had this at a Four Seasons before
We had dinner on one occasion in the restaurant and the service was not quite as previously experienced
An experience worth having
My brief comments relate to my luncheon experience yesterday at MODE Kitchen and Bar
I would imagine that some of the more sophisticated travellers from the US that used the brand overseas would be very disappointed
We made a return visit to the hotel only to be left again disappointed with our experience which I did not mention in my previous review but that is another story
